name: การิน ปริศนาคดีอาถรรพ์ the game : ตอนพิธีเปลี่ยนชีพ
description: Player play as "Lantarima", female protagonist who has the sense of darkness, to solve the mystery murder. "Garin", her extremely unfriendly classmate, is the only one who can tell what this mystery is all about. She has to deal with him or the next murder can’t be stop.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (64 bit) Processor: 2.2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX compatible card Storage: 500 MB available space
